HomeSectionOne.title: Organic Farming.
HomeSectionOne.description: Organic farming is farming in harmony with nature, using materials avai lable from nature and avoiding or limiting synthetic chemicals, with the goal of providing agricultural products that are safe for health and maintaining environmental balance and natural cycles, while adhering to the 4 principles of organic farming.

HomeSectionTwo.title: Advantages of Organic Farming in Bali
description: Very high export potential due to the many international tourists and events.
A strong cultural heritage makes it easier to apply the concept of organic farming.
Support from the Bali provincial government with the passing of a law declaring Bali as an organic island.
The Subak irrigation system, which is a world heritage.

Timeline.content: Initial exploration phase for land search and farmer approach, with significant resistance from farmers to switch to organic farming. Finally, in 2014, the first farmers willing to switch were from Klungkung Regency and Karangasem Regency. In 2015, a cooperation contract was obtained with Subak Sangeh, starting with a total area of 5 hectares.

In 2017, PT. Bali Sri Organik was established with the goal of representing Indonesia in the field of organic agriculture. The first organic certificate was issued by LEsos for Subak Sangeh. A rice warehouse and integrated production facility were built in Sangeh Village. Support in the form of agricultural machinery was provided by the government.

After 5 national certificates were issued by 2020, in this phase, there are 3 nationally certified Subaks and 1 internationally certified Subak. Distribution of products has been established through cooperation with several national and international distributors. A color sorter machine was introduced to maximize product quality.

With nearly 200 hectares of certified land and approximately 800,000 kg of annual production, we are striving to make Bali the first organic island in the world, focusing on downstream processing with sustainable and environmentally friendly methods.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description:
PT. Bali Sri Organik was established in 2012 and is part of the Medco Group, operating in the agricultural sector with the goal of becoming a reliable organic producer in Indonesia, especially in Bali. 
Factors such as land use changes, increasing population, the use of inorganic fertilizers that reduce soil fertility, the lack of farmer welfare, limited information about organic farming methods, the increase in tourists each year, and the Bali Go Organic government program motivated us to contribute to addressing these issues.
After careful and thorough research and surveys conducted by experts, PT. Bali Sri Organik was founded in 2012.
AboutUs.Vision-description: To become a company that can meet the needs for high-quality organic food, and a company that can improve the welfare of farmers.
AboutUs.Mission-description: To become a transnational company that can bring Indonesia's name to the international stage, particularly in the field of organic agriculture.
AboutUs.Raw-material-description: Together with the government and our experts, we provide quality and environmentally friendly raw materials such as seeds and fertilizers.
AboutUs.Farming-tools: Mechanization of Environmentally Friendly Farming Tools
AboutUs.Farming-tools-description: Supporting low-emission programs since 2022, we have been using electricity and not using fossil fuels for our organic farming activities.
AboutUs.Certificate-description: Since 2017, we have obtained both National and International standard certifications.

Products.description: Mentik Wangi Susu rice is an organic rice. This premium local rice is grown from local paddy seeds without genetic modification (GMO) and is cultivated organically without the use of pesticides or other chemicals. Additionally, this rice has more complete nutritional content, with relatively high fiber and well-preserved minerals. Therefore, the quality of this rice is better, safer, and healthier.

Red rice is one type of rice that contains high nutritional value and offers more health benefits compared to white rice. One of the advantages of red rice over white rice lies in its nutritional composition. Important nutrients such as fiber, essential fatty acids, B-complex vitamins, and minerals are found in the bran layer of red rice. The antioxidants present in red rice also play an important role in combating free radicals in the body.

Organic rice is softer compared to non-organic rice. Its aroma is also different, with organic rice having a more pleasant fragrance. When cooked, organic rice cooks faster and requires less water. Organic rice contains high levels of nutrients, glucose, carbohydrates, and protein. On the other hand, non-organic rice contains harmful pesticides and has lower protein content. In terms of shelf life, organic rice lasts longer.
